name: Cavern Creeper
description:
Made for the Mix and Game Jam (2020)

Mixed Genres:

Puzzle and Roguelike

Randomly generated levels and you need to reach the door to go deeper.

Your character leaves a trail that makes the previous tiles you were on untraversable.

Plan your moves and go as deep as you can! 

Have fun! :)

Art, Design, and Programming by me 

Credits to:

messersm for BGM (https://opengameart.org/content/chiptune-song-1)

farfadet46 for SFX (https://opengameart.org/content/bubbles-pop)

wubitog for SFX (https://opengameart.org/content/bubbles-pop)

qubodup for SFX (https://opengameart.org/content/door-open-door-close-set)
